images.description: DSS image of region in Puppis containing the open clusters M46 (also known as NGC 2437), M47 (also known as NGC 2422), NGC 2423 and 2425, and planetary nebula NGC 2438
Misti Mountain Observatory image of open cluster NGC 2437, also known as M46, superimposed on an NOAO background; also shown is planetary nebula NGC 2438
